basic_info.description: I'm Srinath Reddy Palle. Experienced professional with 8 years in web and windows application development using Microsoft.NET technologies. Skilled in design and development of applications with expertise in C#.NET, .NET Core, MVP, MVC, ADO.NET, React JS, Interfaces and Python. Proficient in SQL Server database design and loosely typed solutions using Events and Delegates in C#. Excels in object-oriented programming, RESTful API development, and troubleshooting, with excellent communication and teamwork abilities. Successfully contributed to development teams, created frameworks for payroll compliance, tax calculation, and implemented role-based algorithms for access rights.
